I18N.Title: COM
I18N.Translation: The 'Comments' frame replaces the old 30-character comment field in ID3v1. It consists of a frame head followed by encoding, language and content descriptors and is ended with the actual comment as a text string. Newline characters are allowed in the comment text string. There may be more than one comment frame in each tag, but only one with the same language and content descriptor.
